title: Start
scene: Click food dishes to pass them left or right. Select the down arrow to add food to your plate.

title: dinnerStart
scene: @@set career to 0@@@@set confidence to 0@@Emma. Seriously, girl. This stew is not going to eat itself.
choices: It's so good. You made this?

title: whatscalled
scene: Cocido, chica.
Figured comfort food would be good the night before my best friend's dissertation defense.

title: thanksbringing
scene: Don't look at me like that! I'm a better cook than you.
And it's not like I'm going to let my best friend defend her dissertation after a night of takeout.

title: stuffed
scene: Are you kidding me? You've hardly had anything.
Nervous about your dissertation defense tomorrow, huh?

title: inSpain
scene: You would not believe how much of this stuff I ate in Spain.
This recipe's okay, if I do say so myself, but only half as good as when you get it there.
choices: Wish I could have come with you.
I was busy that year taking quals, if I recall.
Still jealous you got to spend six months there.

title: regrets
scene: @@decr confidence 1@@Oh, come on. Don't beat yourself up. I'm pretty sure you made the right decision.
Tomorrow you'll be Dr. Emma Richards, marine biologist. And I'll just be some chick who ate too much cocido.

title: quals
scene: And now you're reaping the sweet rewards of that wise decision. Tomorrow you'll be Dr. Emma Richards, marine biologist. I'll just be some chick who ate too much cocido.
Speaking of which, could you, uh, pass that back...?

title: loveocean
scene: Look, Em. I've known you as long as anyone. And you've always wanted this. You've been in love with the oceans since we were kids.
Remember 4th grade? Mrs. Anderson? Oh my god, that diorama. You spent ages on that.
choices: I wanted it to be... perfect.

title: whatspecialty
scene: You're kind of still working on it. It's just a 400 page brick of a dissertation now.
What are they called again, your little buddies?

title: pickShrimp
scene: @@set career to 0@@Right. Lysmata amoeba ninnies. Thingies.
I invited some to dinner, but turned out they're a more expensive date than I thought. Seafood is expennnnsive.
choices: Don't blame me, I just work here.

title: pickLobsters
scene: @@set career to 1@@Right. I tried to invite old Homarus to dinner, but turns out he's a more expensive date than I thought. Seafood's getting expennnnsive.
choices: Don't blame me, I just work here.

title: pickCoral
scene: @@set career to 2@@Right. Octo-coro-lala-rama-dingdong. I tried to invite ol' Octo Lala to dinner, but turns out he was too busy getting registered on the endangered species list to attend.

title: howufeel
scene: Hey. What's up?
Oh, don't give me that look. You're quiet, and it's not just nerves. What's on your mind?
choices: I'm just excited to be starting my career.
I'm just wondering if it was worth it.
I'm just worried about the future.

title: surePath
scene: @@incr confidence 1@@Heh. You're gonna knock 'em out of the park, Em. @@if career eq 0@@Those amoeba shrimp@@endif@@@@if career eq 1@@Your Homarus Lobstarus buddies@@endif@@@@if career eq 2@@Your octo-coral-reefie pals@@endif@@ have got a new superhero.

title: unsurePath
scene: @@decr confidence 1@@Worth it? Are you kidding?

You're about to start a career doing everything you love. Emma Richards, defender of @@if career eq 0@@the amoeba shrimp!@@endif@@@@if career eq 1@@Homarus Lobstarus!@@endif@@@@if career eq 2@@the octo-coral-reefies!@@endif@@
You're going places. I can feel it.

title: futureWorry
scene: @@decr confidence 1@@Look at you, always freaking out when things go too well.
Look, Emma. You've fought hard to get here. From what I've seen, you're an amazing scientist and a good teacher.
Now if I can just get you to take an evening off and go on a date, you'll pretty much have it all.

title: haveSomeWine
scene: Now seriously. I am not joking about this. Have some damn wine. Relax with your friends.
The future can take care of itself.
